website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and compact with everything the family photographer needs, the Nikon D5500 maintains its position as a great general-purpose dSLR.
pros: The Nikon D5500 delivers excellent photo quality as well as a performance that can keep up with your kids and pets
cons: The redesigned grip may not be comfortable for people with large hands, and Nikon really needs to update its Wi-Fi app

customer_reviews.title: Easily identifiable as the D range
customer_reviews.text: This is an update from my D5100. Easily identifiable as the D range. However the main difference is the larger touch screen, this is just fantastic. All the menu changes are easily available, at a a touch. The wifi was not easy to set up and I opted for a different app to get it to work. My GPS (opteka) works with the D5500 as does the additional battery pack holder (Model DSTE, not recommended). I bought this as a refurbished model and saved a large amount of money. It came in a plain white box with no manual and no post processing discs. These were downloaded on line, but I still like having a book. A highly recommended camera.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond R. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: For under $1,000 you can only win with this!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! The wife is a picture but and she loves this camera! Clearing is amazing! Touch screen is great and there are so many setting a guy like me can break it in 5 min! She on the other hand is doing unbelievable things with this!! I purchaed the "big" Lens for her also and she can reach out 200 yards and take crystal clear action pictures of the kids playing sports.
customer_reviews.author: Uplateagain

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Capable!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has so many controls that you can screw up/create any picture you want... or turn on 'Auto' and point 'n shoot with excellent results! It is an outstanding camera with a beautiful 'articulating touch-screen LCD display' that allows you to view your subject/shot from any angle and displays controls for every element of the exposure. The only shortcoming is the microphone in movie mode. But a $20 external mike attached to the hot-shoe makes a huge difference. Love this camera! The D5600 has Bluetooth and can use Snapbridge for better connectivity but you give up other advantages like weight.
customer_reviews.author: William Shaul

customer_reviews.title: Love my Nikon 5500!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it so far. It is my first DSLR and love opportunities to go use it. It was fairly easy to learn all the buttons and navigate the menus/options. Love how Nikon set it up. I highly recommend the Nikon 5500 for Dummies books to learn the ins and outs of the camera. It is cheap on Kindle and written very well. Study all this up and you will really start to understand how to take some great pics. Auto/Scene mode also take great photos, but its so much fun manipulating a scene with the light you have available.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Parker

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D5500 Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had time to practice with the camera and learn about the settings. I have very much enjoyed the camera so far although I have had it only a month. I like all of the features and know that over time I will better understand how to use all of them. The Wi-Fi is a great feature too. I'm glad I spent so much time researching camera brands, styles and models and looked for the best pricing before making this purchase. I feel I got a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chickenmissie

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from D3100 - nice upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: I moved from a D3100. I didn't expect to experience a material difference. I just expected a bit of a lighter weight camera. A pleasant surprise was a noticeable improvement in low light conditions. I take a lot of candid indoor photos and being able to extend the ability to take them without a flash was a pleasant surprise. I still don't remember to use the touch screen capability all the time - changing habits takes some time. One final attribute that was noticeable is faster cycle time between shots. I haven't actually measured side by side with my D3100, but I clearly notice it as I take photos in rapid succession
customer_reviews.author: Occasional Spender

customer_reviews.title: A truly fantastic camera! Amazing picture quality with Nikkor lenses
customer_reviews.text: A truly fantastic camera! Amazing picture quality with Nikkor lenses. Great for astrophotography as well as vacation/landscape photos. Lightweight but sturdy. Wifi feature that connects to your phone sounds interesting but in practice is pretty pointless unless you forgot the cable that connects the camera to your laptop. LCD screen is sharp and bright. Battery efficiency is excellent even in near freezing weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: **Caution** - Gray Market Camera
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and the quality but I received a gray market camera not a US camera. Be careful when buying from Amazon. I thought I was getting a US market camera but I did not. I did not notice this before it was to late to return the item. I noticed that it was a gray market camera when I purchased my first extra lens and compared the serial numbers.
customer_reviews.author: jvejrp1

customer_reviews.title: A great step up
customer_reviews.text: A great choice for the photographer looking to take the jump from point and shoot cameras. The touch screen is very intuitive, with only a few personal complaints. The fact it shoots 1080p at 60 fps with Vibration Reduction is a huge bonus. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: 70Dart340

customer_reviews.title: Horrible video!  Great pictures.
customer_reviews.text: It takes great pictures, as long as you use the view finder. When you look use the "live view" LCD screen, then when you press the shutter button, the camera is painfully slow and clunky. Heaven forbid you want to take video with this camera. It can't keep the subject in focus for anything! The camera is slow and clunky for video while the LCD screen is turned on. It is required for the LCD screen to be turned on while taking video. I can't believe I paid this much money for such a crappy camera. My $200 Sony is way better than this camera. Anybody want to buy a camera?
customer_reviews.author: BassoonMomma

customer_reviews.title: It is a great camera overall
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this camera for 7 months now. It is a great camera overall. my only problem with it is that there is no designated ISO button or switch, you have to go into the menu to change ISO. But I am very happy with the quality of pictures I am getting. I use this for sports photography
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of my best purchases ever. As an amateur photographer previously using point and shoot cameras and my phone to take photos, this camera has improved my results dramatically. The 18-140 zoom is a great boon and I no longer miss out on taking shots that I used to previously find impossible.Waited a while to buy it and I'm glad I did get it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Nikon d5500
customer_reviews.text: Bought camera used. It looks and performs as if new. Really a good camera. It takes excellent photos and the 18-140mm lens is an ideal range for most of my needs. I have added the Nikon 35mm f1.8 and the Nikon 55-300mm. Both excellent. Bought all "used" and saved a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Carole P. Arneson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Auto Focus
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great camera....but for a noobie....I found the menu's hard to decipher. And although I'm not sure I will ever find a camera that I enjoy the focus of as much...I chose to return it in favor of micro 4/3rds. Might go back someday tho....
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera and lens combination, and it was priced competitively against other sources and models. My only issue was a lost viewfinder hood being lost while walking around with the camera hung around my neck. The flexibility of the shooting controls for various scenarios, ease of use, and wifi connectivity have impressed me as a medium level photographer.
customer_reviews.author: TXLowRider

customer_reviews.title: Truly brilliant little camera
customer_reviews.text: Truly brilliant little camera, image quality as good as my Sony a6000 (now sold), and with an articulated touch screen. The menu system makes the Sony menu look exactly what it is - an incomprehensible mess. The Nikon system is clear and intuitive. Great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. David

customer_reviews.title: Generally Good camera.
customer_reviews.text: All in all very good camera. My only regret is not buying a zoom lens like 18 - 140, which is more flexible in most circumstances for framing. with the 2 camera package I have to change lens more often, as neither lens are very flexible in framing my shots. Also the wi-fi connection sometimes take a bit of work.
customer_reviews.author: Runner123

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot research before I purchased this camera. I really love it, the features are great. This is my first DSLR, so I am far from a professional. But somebody just learning, who wants to learn how to use a camera properly. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Olivos

customer_reviews.title: The camera is an excellent choice, I was debating among the D5300
customer_reviews.text: The camera is an excellent choice, I was debating among the D5300, D5600 and this one. The image quality of the three of us is basically the same with a slightly improve for the D5500 and D5600 ones. However, the D5300 includes GPS which can be useful. The camera is excellent for beginners and includes similar image quality to the D7000 without the professional buttons. Respect the seller, despite an original issue, everything was solved quickly and diligently. The customer service takes serious the inquiries with professionalism.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sánchez

customer_reviews.title: Thanks amazon for providing great camera at great price
customer_reviews.text: Vwry impressive camera.. thank god I made choice of buying 5500 over D3400 from Nikon. Wifi functionality and camera quality all superb.
customer_reviews.author: chaitanya

customer_reviews.title: Most def recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great value!!! I Definitely recommend snatching this deal up NOW! (And no, no one's paying me to say this!) ^.^
customer_reviews.author: Angel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Suits me
customer_reviews.text: Comparing this to my D200. It has no front dial, buttons are smallish. Camera strap eyelets replaced with a bar (I really hate this).Changing the ISO is made difficult. But all is forgiven when I flip open the view screen. Sure, I got a viewfinder but the articulating screen I'm in love with. Plus it's way lighter than the 200. I got the red to cut down on the "where is it" factor.
customer_reviews.author: Sammichman

customer_reviews.title: This camera has a few more advanced features than the Sony and the Macro lens is perfect for taking pictures of my fountain pens
customer_reviews.text: This camera replaced a Sony NEX 7. I purchased a Nikon macro lens as well. This camera has a few more advanced features than the Sony and the Macro lens is perfect for taking pictures of my fountain pens. I buy the old beat up ones, restore them and sell them on eBay.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Rechtin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for about a month the now. Love it. Eventually I'd like a better lens but the kit lens is capable of pretty sharp shots. I'm maxing out at 16 megapixels with the kit lens. After all of my research on different cameras and what would be the right starter camera for me I believe this is truly the best one for the money. All my photos are on this kit lens.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the D5500 to replace my old D50. Wow what a difference 10 years make!! The D5500 is smaller and lighter, but yet the grip is still great and the screen is fantastic. I love the size of it and touchscreen capabilities. I paired a Nikkor prime 50mm lens for portraiture and am loving the combination. The built in wi-fi works seamlessly so far. Fantastic quality images right out of the box! I'm a Nikon fan for life!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Barney

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. Nothing special. Save your money and buy a really good one.
customer_reviews.text: The price point may be for beginners but if you have never worked a camera before this will not be easy to understand. I still don’t understand what everything does.
customer_reviews.author: hb9098

customer_reviews.title: ... from PORTABLE GUY through Amazon and it was in perfect condition. I bought it as a replacement for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it used from PORTABLE GUY through Amazon and it was in perfect condition. I bought it as a replacement for a D5200 that was broken (due to an accident, not a quality issue). I love the new built-in Wi-Fi, whereas my D5200 used the small Wi-Fi attachment unit, which was sort of a pain to keep track of, plug in and unplug, etc. I also have a D5000 so I've been a big fan of this product line from Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin T. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: The Best for The Best Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, more camera for a great price, well worth the extra money. I had a D40 Camera so this is quite a step up, and what a difference, I read all the reviews and I find the camera easy to operate and handle. I paid the extra for one lens 18-140mm a perfect camera and lens for what I want to use it for. It came with a battery and charger for car, extra I did not think it had.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A Fader

customer_reviews.title: Great small package alternative for all users.
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the Nikon D750 that I currently own. Very simple to adapt to . The size for my small handle and weight is just perfect. Buttons are a bit small but very usable. Very pleased with the flip out screen I find the automatic of and on when in live view when face is near fantastic. Recently switched over to Nikon from Canon and have no regrets. Great camera as a backup or travel alternative . Much easier to have on my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Goins

customer_reviews.title: If even I can take good pictures with it, I can only imagine how amazing a skilled photographer would do!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first SLR camera, and it's been a good one to grow into. I started off by using it with most things set to auto, then gradually, as I became more comfortable with it, started taking advantage of the more advanced features. It's paid off--in our recent ice storm, hummingbirds who ordinarily frequent our feeders would park themselves on it while they went into torpor between feedings, and I managed to get some great shots!
customer_reviews.author: SCM

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It is so easy to take pictures even for an amateur. We spent hundreds of dollars on Senior Pictures and the ones I took for prom are better. Very easy and gives me room to play and learn manual settings.
customer_reviews.author: Pat2A

customer_reviews.title: Great DSLR!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this D5500!!! This is my 1st DSLR. Had it for 2 weeks and deiced to try it out in an Air Show. I only use it in M mode(force myself to learn). After I went home and upload it into my PC. I was shock how clear and sharp those photos are!! The D5500 make taking photos so enjoyable, I even sign up for a local Photography class wanting to use all the features this DSLR have to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C

customer_reviews.title: The lens works great and makes taking different type shots easy in less ...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get my first digital SLR, and this one is the right size and works similar to my last film camera. The lens works great and makes taking different type shots easy in less time not having to change lenses. Fits my photography style.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Walters

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It is my first camera and it took me a total of 1 hour using he camera to figure out how to use it. I still have a lot to learn, but the camera does take great pictures and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect camera. Very happy with purchase! Took many great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Drost

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner so I don't know everything about the camera yet. But the camera is amazing!! It's lighter then expected, easy to use controls and clean crips pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee and a Book

customer_reviews.title: Good made better!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera and significantly lighter than it's predecessors. The controls are easily manipulated and more user friendly. In comparison to my Sony a6000 pictures seem slightly less sharp, however that may be more related to the lens system. I am very happy with this system, especially the WiFi interface.
customer_reviews.author: JJT3MD

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera so far. The wife can't put it down. There's a lot to learn so she'll be busy for a while. Glad I got it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy E.

customer_reviews.title: Simply an amazing camera. Very happy with my decision.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, takes great pictures, amazing value. I did so much research before buying this going back and forth between brands and models but this simply had everything I was looking for and after using it I have not been disappointed. Nikon included everything in this easy to use and learn model.
customer_reviews.author: David Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Camera
customer_reviews.text: If you want something to start off on, this is great
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this camera. I absolutely love it. My first camera, and it's all that I could ask for and more. WELL worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: deirdre sullivan

customer_reviews.title: My first DSLR camera but find it easy and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: My first DSLR camera but find it easy and fun to use, picture quality is also so much better than my old point and shoot amazing photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like what I see
customer_reviews.text: I still have to explore the camera but for now whatever I have used in the last week, I like what I see. The pictures are very sharp and clear. I thinking I am falling in love with my very first DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: Sarfraz Alam

customer_reviews.title: Great starter camera
customer_reviews.text: I always loved the art of taking pictures. Now that my kids have grown up and moved out I decided to purchase a camera. This camera has meet all my expectations. Thank you for offering an affordable camera.
customer_reviews.author: M. H

customer_reviews.title: Finally upgraded d40.
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera. takes great picture..my d40 still takes great picture. It does feel upgrade. i have not used video yet but great grip. used with my 35 mm. picture quality is great although sometime its hard to differentiate between d/40 and this in good light. this works better in low light condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mahavir

customer_reviews.title: I love Nikon and this one is great
customer_reviews.text: I love Nikon and this one is great. But for some reason, Amazon charged me TWICE for tax. Not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: John Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! Beautiful quality and lots of great settings
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Beautiful quality and lots of great settings. If I'm too lazy or pressed for time to configure the settings myself I can just switch it to Auto and the pics turn out great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever DSLR and im truly, truly loving this camera. I was torn between the D5300 due to pricing and the specs being close to similar. In the end, I was sold really on the touchscreen and the weight and size of the D5500 and I'm glad I chose this good looking camera.
customer_reviews.author: R. llamas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, the touch screen is cool but I really ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, the touch screen is cool but I really don't use it as much as I thought I would. Could have gone with 5300 and been very happy. Just ask is it worth it to you for the extra $?
customer_reviews.author: xbrx955

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, lightweight DSLR
customer_reviews.text: I had a Nikon D300, which is sadly out of step with modern sensors and memory technology. And it's so heavy that I get shooting (sorry, no pun intended) pains in my neck from carrying it. But I loved what it could do. I also have four Nikkor lenses. The D5500, made from carbon fiber plastic, is much lighter, and it uses my existing DX lenses. I haven't learned to love the touch screen, but it may just be a matter of getting used to it. It won't do everything the D300 could do, and I probably won't ever use the "effects" feature, but it is a powerful, lightweight, high resolution DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: Jo R. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera in low light.  Not impressed with audio.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Takes unbelievable pictures in low lighting. I'm not impressed at all with the audio in video mode. Maybe an external mic would help.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget junkie

customer_reviews.title: Buttons are a bit sticky and some of the rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: Buttons are a bit sticky and some of the rubber on the body is peeling off, but it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: already taking nice action shots at sporting events
customer_reviews.text: Out of box picture taking and with a few youtube tutorials, already taking nice action shots at sporting events!
customer_reviews.author: D. A.H.

customer_reviews.title: its pretty saturated, but this camera stands above them all
customer_reviews.text: I'm not into photography, but my wife is. I got this for her as a gift after doing my research. There's a lot of cameras in this price range, its pretty saturated, but this camera stands above them all. It has all the features of the others and it does it better than the rest. Great product, delivered earlier than expected, everything was legit, I couldn't be happier. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Vladis Tar

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D5500
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera just before our African safari vacation. Worth every penny, we have pictures from the trip that will last a lifetime. Really easy to use, camera does all the thinking, perfect for the novice photographer like me.
customer_reviews.author: sonyfan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera for a beginner. You can start in auto mode until you get the hang of ISO, Aperture and Shutter speed. Controls are right at your fingertips. The live mode and the touch screen is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Benchman86

customer_reviews.title: Love it, it is my first Nikon
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it is my first Nikon, i think it is great for a begginer in photography, also the touch screen make it a perfect match, i really love it it takes perfect photos, i use it with a 18-140 mm lens.
customer_reviews.author: Renzo MG

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: One of the nicer ends on DSLR. Package came fast not using Amazon prime and was wrapped carefully. Initial opening of the box and observing the contents made it appear practically brand new. I am enjoying this camera and plan to buy accessories and use it for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: This camera takes beautiful pictures and it is an excellent replacement for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes beautiful pictures and it is an excellent replacement for my D70s. That being said, there are a few annoying features: 1) There is no shortcut to switch between scenes on the dials, forcing you to use the touchscreen every time you want to change scene modes, and 2) You can't turn the flash off unless the touchscreen is open. I also wish there were a way to limit the upper auto ISO, as it goes very high in moderate light conditions, which may effect the quality of a large print.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: The camera itself was in great condition. Although the camera I received had a ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself was in great condition. Although the camera I received had a malfunction with the shutter release. This also occurred when I put on a new lense. I highly doubt amazon has a qualified person inspecting these cameras. For this reason just spend the extra hundred dollars and buy it new.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy andrew dunkel

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from point-and-shoot
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Wifi works great, and the pictures I'm learning to take are far, far superior than our old click-and-shoot Nikon. This is a great beginner DSLR, with enough bells and whistles for a novice at this point.
customer_reviews.author: B. Petree

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner camera/video
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old bought this herself and she loves it! Great beginner camera/video camera
customer_reviews.author: G. McGrail

customer_reviews.title: Nikon removed the low pass filter from this model.
customer_reviews.text: Very compact model, light weight and no low pass filter for sharper images.
customer_reviews.author: D. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great Digital Camera - adjustable position LCD Touch Screen a wonderful feature
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my daughter, and I am green with envy. A beautifully designed camera. The flip-out LDC touch screen on the rear is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis M. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Like new!
customer_reviews.text: I was debating whether to save a bit extra for the D5600 but once I found a great deal on this one I hoped it wasn’t trash. I wasn’t disappointed. Solid quality camera, even when used!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera the 18-55mm, 70-300mm lens package is a good deal, I added an 18-140mm lens as well. I am very happy with this camera choice and Nikon is an excellent brand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: The Camera for the Life You Actually Live
customer_reviews.text: I've had far heavier cameras with more features, but this packs all the truly useful punch into a lightweight-but-durable body that you actually want to WEAR to places. As many journalists say, the best camera in the world is the one you have when you really have to take a picture. This camera is far more likely to be there than a ten ton professional DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: John Burkitt

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I upgraded from a Canon SL1 and the ability for the flip screen and the quality of the images are great! The battery life is also excellent as I took about 600 photos on it before the battery died.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Perfect camera. Takes excellent pictures. I have been able to capture birds in flight from quite a distance, which is exactly why I purchased the camera. Shutter speed is exactly as manufacture describes.
customer_reviews.author: happymom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very poor performance, item came without manual, had consistent issues focusing and I returned
customer_reviews.author: Simon M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the features and decreased weight of this camera - perfect for travel and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the touch screen and the 18-140 mm lens! This maybe my new favorite lens!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great replacement for my old D3100 and with great features for a DSLR of its price-range.
customer_reviews.author: The Reader

customer_reviews.title: Bought this before my trip to Peru and LOVED IT. Took great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before my trip to Peru and LOVED IT. Took great pictures. Still have to learn how to use some of the features.
customer_reviews.author: Dale S. Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife and she is in love with it!! Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: C.F Missouri dad

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for New Photographers
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely amazing camera for a new user like me. With the 2 lenses provided, the set gives me a whole range of things to do from portraits to landscapes to nearly everything under the sun. Only exception is that video mode on the camera is a little sketchy and I'm still trying to get around learning about it more. Attached are some pictures for a wedding I attended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... fallen inlove with the Nikon D5500 and all its amazing features (wifi and touchscreen)
customer_reviews.text: So I have to say that I have fallen inlove with the Nikon D5500 and all its amazing features (wifi and touchscreen). I have never own a DSLR before so I think this is the best entry level camera to get.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Randall

customer_reviews.title: First DSLR
customer_reviews.text: My first DSLR and I absolutely love it, easy to use. A must have for anyone considering getting into travel or landscape photography. I highly recommend this model over it predecessor the 5300, simply for its touchscreen capability.
customer_reviews.author: ZurichDDR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Solid pics, sturdy frame, loads of fun
customer_reviews.author: Justin Quail

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my D5500. I had the bundle at a good price and I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: its a great camera! Great for beginner or intermediate DSLR
customer_reviews.text: only problem I have encountered is the wifi option not working on all phones. its a great camera! Great for beginner or intermediate DSLR photographer
customer_reviews.author: Aladin

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried it extensively yet but so far am extremely pleased with the purchase. Light, compact, excellent focusing, works great with the Tamron 18-270 zoom which I have purchased specifically for it. Definitely will recommend to family/friends!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent in a small package was too heavy for this ...
customer_reviews.text: This little camera met my expectations in every degree. It does not match my large Nikons for some type of shots but delivers all I need for my computer's faux darkroom. The 18-140 lens, excellent in a small package was too heavy for this system (one hand operation) but the 50mm provided the companion to correct that problem. Worth every penny so far.
customer_reviews.author: Arne Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, well represents the Nikon brand. Love the touch screen!
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Burns

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace my existing, but still working Nikon D5100. I love this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Adamsmommy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my new Nikon. Upgraded from a Nikon D50. Obsessed with the screen rotation and the SnapBridge function.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D5500
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. The touch screen is great. All the focus points gives great control of the scene. Just upgrading from a D3200, so having to figure out all the features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Amazing features. A little overwhelming in the beginning, but be patient the results are more than worth it. Just take and start shooting.
customer_reviews.author: J. Black

customer_reviews.title: New Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera and am excited to get to use it more! I hope I get the free memory card offer too
customer_reviews.author: Sara MacMillan

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D5500 a Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Crisp, clear, beautiful photos. Captures those special moments with ease. Love the new live viewer and the ability to turn it. Great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much
customer_reviews.text: My first camera with lenses! Love it so much, great quality pictures, so much to learn about the camera still...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best camera so far
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera that we have used so far. Good cost/quality relationship.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolás Jara

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. The small size is nice. Photos are sharp with good color and dynamic range.
customer_reviews.author: mister eric

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera/reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera. Not quite pro, but close to it!
customer_reviews.author: John B. Pearrell

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Love it...Love it...Love it.... Easy to use even with no camera/photography experience.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Refurb model - Pristine condition
customer_reviews.text: Bought refurb. Everything came in box as expected, all functioning. WiFi can be a bit finicky with Android devices, but works when setup right. Night time photography is great despite the smaller sensor and aperture w/ the 18-55mm lens. Light, small, well constructed, well designed body. Could not ask for more from a mid-pro level camera. Would recommend to any amateur photographer in search of something more. Came w/ ~200 shutter actuations in brand new appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Dog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just like a classic Nikon but more modern and more functions as wifi and touch screen. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great body, nice features and when paired with quality lenses the pictures are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: NNYNJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little compact camera. Very good quality of pics with the right lens selection.
customer_reviews.author: Irinette

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Fulfillment
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Accurately reviewed. Fine fulfillment by the vendor. No complaints and totally satisfied with the product and the experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nikon D5500 DX-format Digital SLR Body (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style:Body| Configuration:BaseNikon D5500 Body DSLR Camera - Black. 24.2MP DX-Format CMOS Sensor. EXPEED 4 Image Processor. No Optical Low-Pass Filter. 3.2" 1,037k-Dot Vary-Angle Touchscreen. Full HD 1080p Video Recording at 60 fps. Built-In Wi-Fi. Continuous Shooting up to 5 fps. 39-Point Multi-CAM 4800DX AF Sensor. Native Sensitivity to ISO 25600. Built-In Interval meter. Body Supplied with: EN-EL14a Rechargeable Li-ion Battery; MH-24 Quick Charger; DK-25 Rubber Eyecup; UC-E17 USB Cable; EG-CP16 Audio Video Cable; AN-DC14 Camera Strap; BF-1B Body Cap; Nikon View NX 2 CD-ROM Provides an extensible design that enables. Design that delivers high availability, scalability, and for maximum flexibility and price/performance.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



Get more creative than ever. Flip out the touchscreen Vari-angle display, find an exciting new perspective and capture it as an ultra-sharp 24.2-megapixel photo. Flick a switch and start recording Full HD 1080 video at a high-speed frame rate of 60p, which is great for fast action and ultra-smooth slow motion. Break free of the ordinary with artistic filters and effects, built-in HDR capabilities, time lapse photography, outstanding low-light capabilities and much more. You won't even have to wait to share your creations built-in Wi-Fi means you can share your images anywhere, anytime.


I AM CONNECTED CREATIVITY
Sometimes, inspiration comes from the tools we use to create. Take the D5500 for example, a compact DSLR capable of inspiring a new level of creativity. From the moment you flip the touchscreen Vari-angle display and capture an ultra-sharp 24.2-megapixel photo, you'll begin to see your photography in a new light. At the flick of a switch, the D5500 transforms into a versatile Full HD video camera. Record 1080 video at a high speed frame rate of 60p perfect for capturing fast-moving subjects or creating ultra-smooth slow motion effects. Break free of the ordinary with star trail images, interval timer sequences and HDR photography. Add artistic filters and effects and even retouch your shots right in the camera, and then share your creations instantly with built-in Wi-Fi. Inspiration has a new name, and it's the D5500.

SHARPEN YOUR CREATIVE VISION
STUNNING, SHARP, DETAILED PHOTOS & VIDEOS
To create amazing photos and videos, a digital SLR needs a great lens, a great image sensor and great image processing. The D5500 has all three. It's high-resolution sensor has no optical low-pass filter, freeing it to capture the outstanding details provided by NIKKOR lenses. Enlarge or crop your shots without losing detail or sharpness. EXPEED 4 image processing handles all of that data with ease for clean, sharply defined images in low light up to 25,600 ISO, 1080/60p videos and an extremely wide dynamic range.

TOUCH AND SHOOT FROM MANY ANGLES
HIGH RESOLUTION TOUCHSCREEN VARI-ANGLE LCD
A first for Nikon DSLRs, the D5500 features a touchscreen Vari-angle LCD for exciting new shooting possibilities and easier handling. Flip out the large 3.2-inch display for an interesting new angle, then simply touch where you want to focus and shoot. A new Fn button gives you one-touch access to important settings like aperture, ISO sensitivity, AF mode and more. During playback, pinch to zoom in and check the details. Easily navigate menu items, set video settings and more, all as familiar as operating a smartphone.

SHARE YOUR SHOTS INSTANTLY
BUILT-IN WI-FI AND SMARTPHONE COMPATIBILITY
Share amazing moments while they're happening and without missing a beat. Flip out the LCD and start taking DSLR-quality selfies! The D5500 quickly transfers your creations to a compatible smartphone or tablet for easy sharing by email, texting or posting online, wherever you are no hot spot needed. Your smartphone or tablet can even act as an external monitor and remote control for the D5500 imagine the possibilities!

Wi-Fi and the Wi-Fi CERTIFIED logo are registered trademarks of the Wi-Fi Alliance.



CREATE EVERYWHERE
SMALL AND DURABLE ENOUGH TO GRAB AND GO
There's an old saying: the best camera is the one that's with you. The D5500 is designed to always be with you. It's small and lightweight (just 14.9-oz), so you won't mind taking it along. Its strong and durable (thanks to a monocoque structure featuring long-fiber reinforced thermoplastics), so you won't worry when conditions get rough. And its ergonomic design and easy-to-use controls will have you shooting the pictures you've always wanted in no time.

FOCUS ON THE MOMENT
The D5500 delivers outstanding speed and accuracy to help you catch all the moments that matter smiles, tears, big plays and big hugs. Its 39-point AF system includes nine highly accurate cross-type sensors for enhanced AF accuracy. Freeze moments by shooting up to 5 frames per second, or extend moments with unlimited continuous shooting at shutter speeds between 4 and 30 seconds for stunning star trail images.

MAKE IT CINEMATIC
Cinematic storytelling is at your fingertips with the D5500. Capture Full HD video at a frame rate of 60p with tack-sharp details, vibrant colors and high-fidelity stereo sound. An improved full-time autofocus keeps moving subjects sharp, and advanced Picture Controls like Flat and Clarity make it easier to perfect your movies in post-production.



SUPPLIED ACCESSORIES
 *  D5500 - Body Only 
 *  EN-EL14a Rechargeable Li-ion Battery 
 *  MH-24 Quick Charger 
 *  DK-25 Rubber Eyecup 
 *  UC-E23 USB Cable 
 *  EG-CP16 Audio Video Cable 
 *  AN-DC3 Strap 
 *  BF-1B Body Cap 
 *  NikonView NX2 CD ROM
feature_bullets: 24.2 MP DX-format CMOS sensor with no optical low-pass filter (OLPF)
High resolution, vari-angle LCD with familiar, smartphone-like touchscreen for easy use
1080/60p HD video capabilities allow for capture of fast-moving subjects or creating slow motion effects
Built-in Wi-Fi and smartphone compatibility for instant sharing
